question: How do I request a new support ticket?
answer: You may request a new support ticket after verifying your ongoing booking with a verified accommodation

question: How do I verify your my booking?
answer: For validation and security purposes$ you will require a unique Booking ID which is shown on your booking details$ as well as the last name of the person who had booked for it

question: Why can't I verify my booking?
answer: If you can't verify your booking$ the accommodation which provides your stay may not be registered on our platform or it may not be verified yet. Contact your accommodation to ask for more clarification.
